title: Rules
contents: bullet | GM determines expedition distance and duration

bullet | GM needs to setup five tables for the expedition: Discovery 2 (good, helpful, interesting) , Danger(incl 2 Enemy,1 ambush 2 Hazard to endure) Obstacle 2(to avoid, overcome),  Fatigue, Ext Fat, Insurmount, Confluence, Quiet day of travel,   and 2 Breakdown.
bullet | Trav journies have Incidents (obstacles, breakdowns, fatigue), Events (interesting stuff on the planet, Discoveries), and Encounters (local wildlife, bad guys, etc)
bullet | Crew tracks food and fuel.
bullet | Crew rolls Recon-Survival Task Chain every Leg.  Effect 4+ allows the crew to discard one card for that leg.
bullet | Adding a leg should also have consequences for the team - miss takeoff, more enemies arrive, more eggs hatch, sick passenger get worse, ...

title: Discovery
contents: text | The crew finds something useful or interesting. Roll on the Discovery Table.

title: Enemy
contents: text | A threat appears! Roll on the Enemy Table.

title: Ambush
contents: text | Creatures or enemies attack from ambush! Roll on the Enemy Table, but the foes attack with surprise.

title: Obstacle
contents: text | A barrier of some sort blocks the expeditionâ€™s way. Roll on the Obstacle Table.

title: Hazard
contents: text | The environment turns dangerous. Roll on the Hazard Table.

title: Insurmountable Obstacle
contents: text | A daunting barrier appears.  If this card cannot be discarded by the Recon-Survival roll, add one leg to the length of the Expedition.

title: Breakdown
contents: text | A vital piece of equipment fails. Roll on the Breakdown Table.

title: Confluence of Events
contents: text | Immediately draw two new cards and combine the results. This card may not be discarded.

title: Fatigue
contents: text | A difficult path wears on the crew.  Make and END check or become Fatigued (DM-2) until you get 8 hours of rest.

title: Extreme Fatigue
contents: text | A very difficult path wears on the crew.  Make and END DM-2 check or become Fatigued (DM-2) until you get 8 hours of rest.
